He summoned his keyblade and swinged at the creature dodged the attack and ran off. "Creep!" Sora insulted the creature, called back his keyblade, and held his bitten arm, grunting in pain. He went to the pipe pouring fresh, pure water, using it to heal his arm. He saw the full moon. He gasped in pain, fell to his knees, and started to scream in agony."WHAT'S HAPPENING TO ME?!?!?!?" Sora sobbed in agony. He stared at his hands as they grew claws. His feet also grew claws that clawed holes in his shoes. He grew fangs that turned silver, and his hair turned platinum. His eyes turned gold, and Sora clutched his butt in pain. He grew a platinum tail. He was sobbing uncontrollably in terrible, painful agony and howled at the moon and passed out.
